revised_title: A Lagrangian Approach to the Boltzmann-Vlasov Equation for Plasmas
tldr: This article presents a Lagrangian formulation of the Boltzmann-Vlasov equation for plasmas, providing a new approach to understanding the behavior of ionized gases in electromagnetic fields. The author derives a variational principle that leads to a new way of analyzing small oscillations around equilibrium, potentially offering new insights into plasma stability and dynamics.
